data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Paths to Adventure: Elven Empires (Map Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Paths to Adventure: Elven Empires Map Pack


This collection of maps custom is built for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop and includes 20 incredible maps related to Elven Empires for use in your campaign. Both GM and Player maps are included.

The Elven Empires map pack is one of an eight-part collection by Paths to Adventure cartography, usable in any game system.

You will find the following maps in this pack:

  • MAP 022: Enchanted Hedge Maze
  • MAP 034: The Grand Court
  • MAP 041: Autumnholm
  • MAP 049: Priory of Illumina
  • MAP 071: Elven Hyaline Domes
  • MAP 082: Royal Burial Mound
  • MAP 098: Pilgrimage to the Great Banyan
  • MAP 104: Passage to the Feyrealm
  • MAP 132: The Inner Sanctum
  • MAP 135: Hideaway of the Swan Maiden
  • MAP 145: Citadel of Lost Knowledge
  • MAP 157: Court of the Fey King
  • MAP 175: Escape from the Feyrealm
  • MAP 179: Harlequins Court
  • MAP 187: Dawnflower Search for the Sun Shards
  • MAP 191: Ancient Elven Tomb
  • MAP 200: Search for the Stone of Sunlight
  • MAP 209: Grand High Temple of the Gods
  • MAP 217: Forest Trail Environment
  • MAP 230: Sanctuary of the Divine Butterfly

Published by: AAW Games

Cartography by: Justin Andrew Mason

Conversion by: Trevor Armstrong

Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: Paths to Adventure: Elven Empires Map PackThis collection of maps custom is built for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop and includes 20 incredible maps related to Elven Empires for use in your campaign. Both GM and Player maps are included.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
